IFT - Receive from P-tunnel
OFT - Send to P-tunnel
OFNL - Downstream join state

"up / PIM enable"
"down / PIM enable"
"up / PIM disable"
"down / PIM disable"

mrt-flag.description:
Mroute flag.
NS:SPT upsend,RT:Reg upsend,MT:Tunnel,NTP:NTP join,DPU:Damping enable,DPD:Damping del,B:Bidir,SU:Slave in use.

fallback-vrf.description: The upstream VRF name of mroute.

type.description:
Save the breakpoint types of the outcoming interface, not used for the query criteria.
For xg,1:mroute outcoming interface,2:outcoming interface added by xg filter,3:outcoming interface added by xg global filter.
For sg,1:mroute outcoming interface,2:outcoming interface added by sg filter,3:outcoming interface added by xg filter,4:outcoming interface added by sg global filter.

oif-flag.description:
Downstream interface flag.
F:Forward,RT:Reg upsend,MT:Tunnel,S:Syn mrt,DF:DF,FLT:Flt add, FD:Flt del.

Down:Interface down

type.description:
Save the breakpoint types of the outcoming interface, not used for the query criteria.
For xg, 1:mroute outcoming interface,2:outcoming interface added by xg filter,3:outcoming interface added by xg global filter. 
For sg, 1:mroute outcoming interface,2:outcoming interface added by sg filter,3:outcoming interface added by xg filter,4:outcoming interface added by sg global filter.
